value.name: Video: Officer who fatally shot man said she had no choice
value.description: A North Carolina police officer who fatally shot a black ... Both versions show the shooting of 27-year-old Danquirs Napoleon Franklin outside a Burger King on March 25. At about the 2-minute ...

value.name: The Latest: Police identify officer, victim in shooting
value.description: In a news release, Charlotte-Mecklenburg police identified the slain man as 27-year-old Danquirs Napoleon Franklin. Officer Wende Kerl was identified as the officer involved in the shooting on Monday.
